events.message: I recently received my order, but the product has a large scratch on the surface and seems damaged.
The issue has been classified under Product Defect based on the customer's description of damage.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the damaged product complaint.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the scratch on your product. I’m here to assist you with this issue.
Could you please provide photos of the damaged area and your order number to help us investigate?
Here are the photos showing the scratch on the product; my order number is 789654321.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would like to go with a replacement, please. Thanks for the quick response.
Your replacement has been arranged and shipped. You will receive tracking details shortly.
Just checking in to ensure that your replacement product was received in perfect condition.
We are glad your issue is resolved with the replacement. Please contact us again if you need further help.
